actions.name: AcceptAdministratorInvitation
actions.description: Grants permission to accept Security Hub invitations to become a member account

actions.name: AcceptInvitation
actions.description: Grants permission to accept Security Hub invitations to become a member account

actions.name: BatchDisableStandards
actions.description: Grants permission to disable standards in Security Hub

actions.name: BatchEnableStandards
actions.description: Grants permission to enable standards in Security Hub

actions.name: BatchImportFindings
actions.description: Grants permission to import findings into Security Hub from an integrated product

actions.name: BatchUpdateFindings
actions.description: Grants permission to update customer-controlled fields for a selected set of Security Hub findings

actions.name: CreateActionTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to create custom actions in Security Hub

actions.name: CreateFindingAggregator
actions.description: Grants permission to create a finding aggregator, which contains the cross-Region finding aggregation configuration

actions.name: CreateInsight
actions.description: Grants permission to create insights in Security Hub. Insights are collections of related findings

actions.name: CreateMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to create member accounts in Security Hub

actions.name: DeclineInvitations
actions.description: Grants permission to decline Security Hub invitations to become a member account

actions.name: DeleteActionTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to delete custom actions in Security Hub

actions.name: DeleteFindingAggregator
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a finding aggregator, which disables finding aggregation across Regions

actions.name: DeleteInsight
actions.description: Grants permission to delete insights from Security Hub

actions.name: DeleteInvitations
actions.description: Grants permission to delete Security Hub invitations to become a member account

actions.name: DeleteMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to delete Security Hub member accounts

actions.name: DescribeActionTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of custom actions using the API

actions.name: DescribeHub
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the hub resource in your account

actions.name: DescribeOrganizationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the organization configuration for Security Hub

actions.name: DescribeProducts
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the available Security Hub product integrations

actions.name: DescribeStandards
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Security Hub standards

actions.name: DescribeStandardsControls
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Security Hub standards controls

actions.name: DisableImportFindingsForProduct
actions.description: Grants permission to disable the findings importing for a Security Hub integrated product

actions.name: DisableOrganizationAdminAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the Security Hub administrator account for your organization

actions.name: DisableSecurityHub
actions.description: Grants permission to disable Security Hub

actions.name: DisassociateFromAdministratorAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to a Security Hub member account to disassociate from the associated administrator account

actions.name: DisassociateFromMasterAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to a Security Hub member account to disassociate from the associated master account

actions.name: DisassociateMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate Security Hub member accounts from the associated administrator account

actions.name: EnableImportFindingsForProduct
actions.description: Grants permission to enable the findings importing for a Security Hub integrated product

actions.name: EnableOrganizationAdminAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to designate a Security Hub administrator account for your organization

actions.name: EnableSecurityHub
actions.description: Grants permission to enable Security Hub

actions.name: GetAdhocInsightResults
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve insight results by providing a set of filters instead of an insight ARN

actions.name: GetAdministratorAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about the Security Hub administrator account

actions.name: GetControlFindingSummary
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a security score and counts of finding and control statuses for a security standard

actions.name: GetEnabledStandards
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the standards that are enabled in Security Hub

actions.name: GetFindingAggregator
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details for a finding aggregator, which configures finding aggregation across Regions

actions.name: GetFindings
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of findings from Security Hub

actions.name: GetFreeTrialEndDate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the end date for an account's free trial of Security Hub

actions.name: GetFreeTrialUsage
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Security Hub usage during the free trial period

actions.name: GetInsightFindingTrend
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an insight finding trend from Security Hub in order to generate a graph

actions.name: GetInsightResults
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve insight results from Security Hub

actions.name: GetInsights
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve Security Hub insights

actions.name: GetInvitationsCount
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the count of Security Hub membership invitations sent to the account

actions.name: GetMasterAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about the Security Hub master account

actions.name: GetMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of Security Hub member accounts

actions.name: GetUsage
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Security Hub usage by accounts

actions.name: InviteMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to invite other AWS accounts to become Security Hub member accounts

actions.name: ListControlEvaluationSummaries
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of controls for a standard, including the control IDs, statuses and finding counts

actions.name: ListEnabledProductsForImport
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Security Hub integrated products that are currently enabled

actions.name: ListFindingAggregators
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of finding aggregators, which contain the cross-Region finding aggregation configuration

actions.name: ListInvitations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Security Hub invitations sent to the account

actions.name: ListMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about Security Hub member accounts associated with the administrator account

actions.name: ListOrganizationAdminAccounts
actions.description: Grants permission to list the Security Hub administrator accounts for your organization

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list of tags associated with a resource

actions.name: SendFindingEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to use a custom action to send Security Hub findings to Amazon EventBridge

actions.name: SendInsightEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to use a custom action to send Security Hub insights to Amazon EventBridge

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a Security Hub resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a Security Hub resource

actions.name: UpdateActionTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to update custom actions in Security Hub

actions.name: UpdateFindingAggregator
actions.description: Grants permission to update a finding aggregator, which contains the cross-Region finding aggregation configuration

actions.name: UpdateFindings
actions.description: Grants permission to update Security Hub findings

actions.name: UpdateInsight
actions.description: Grants permission to update insights in Security Hub

actions.name: UpdateOrganizationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the organization configuration for Security Hub

actions.name: UpdateSecurityHubConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update Security Hub configuration

actions.name: UpdateStandardsControl
actions.description: Grants permission to update Security Hub standards controls
